mapper.insert: insert into image(img_no, us_no, prd_no, can_no, rev_no, img_file, img_use, img_oname, img_type) values(img_no_seq.nextval, #{us_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prd_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{can_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rev_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{img_file}, #{img_use}, #{img_oname}, #{img_type})
